title: Interdisciplinary Collaborative Online Mathematical Problem-Solving Project

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Online project-based learning where elementary school teachers collaborate with experts from other fields to develop math problem-solving strategies applicable in real classrooms

learning_goals: Participants collaboratively design at least two real-world connected mathematics problems with interdisciplinary team members
Participants apply DBR methodology to reflectively evaluate problem-solving processes at least three times
Participants incorporate peer feedback at least five times using LMS-based collaborative tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
